items.title: 3 dead, including 2 children, in New Mexico flooding, local authorities say
items.description: The Village of Ruidoso said three people died in "historic" flash flooding.

items.title: US measles cases hit highest number in 33 years, CDC data shows
items.description: Measles cases in the United States have reached their highest number in more than 30 years, according to new federal data published Wednesday.
